_sText:
Welcome to Apriveruca - School of Conjuring

As one might expect in a school of conjuring, there are many strange and wondrous items to view and find.  However, the Ts have decided to blast the school back to oblivion.

Look for teleports, secret passages, hidden doors and weapon caches.
See if you can find the infirmary, the rainbow globe, the re-direction room, the
malfunctioning beamer, the map room, the way to the tree perch, or the path to the tower balcony.  There is even a blue bottle of bubbles.
